DOC.criteria: Be willing undergo bilateral breast augmentation subglandular , submuscular , biplanar placement breast implant inframammary approach Be candidate device style size available study Have tuberous breast , congenital anomaly breast ( e.g. , Poland 's Syndrome ) , grade 3 ptosis Have undergone previous breast surgery Have tissue cover determine inadequate unsuitable surgeon
